anuradhapura - dahayiyagama mansandhiya asala karmika pedesa dakwa athi adi 30ka pamana palalin yuthu mema margaya anuradhapura nagara salasumkaranaye di idikota aththe karmika pedese sewa awashyathasapuralima sandahayi.nagaraye ratha wahana thadabadaya awama kirima sandahath mema margaya bhawitha karana bawayi janathawa pawasanne.kese wethath anuradhapura mahanagara sabhawa salasum kara aththe, kabanika pohora bhawithayen nipadawana aahara saha nishpadana alewi kirime welenda sankirnayak mema margaye ek paththaka idikirimatayi.namuth pradeshaye wyaparikayan athulu siwil sanwidhana rasak chodana karanne, meya nagara salasumkaranayata paribhahira wa siduwena awidhimath wyapruthiyak bawayi.
